name: Ice Princess First Love 2017
description:
Ice Princess and Prince Charming’s First Love Story is a dress-up & Make-up game. Emily is a Princess of a Frozen Island. She was caged in an hunted & ruined Palace. One day a Prince came and fell in love with Emily Princess. He freed her out. Now you have to ready the royal girl and win the best beautician, Fashion Designer & dress designer award.

Become a best wedding planner of this royal couple and fulfil their dreams of First Love. You have to clean the princess first in bath scene. After that it’s turn to make the Ice princess more gorgeous with Spa process for her first love, when its done you have to take the Ice Princess of Royal world to Parlour and prepare him with best make-up for her wedding. Ice Princess is ready for Dress-up now. Ice princess need your help to design & decorate different clothes for her first love event and weeding. She need to create the style of her dreams in which you and your mommy are the assistant of that shinning star of beauty.

There are
- 7 Different Levels
- Cleaning of Dirty Ice Princess
- Take Bath to Royal Girl
- Full-Face Spa
- Apply Makeup to Glorious Princess
- Choose the most suitable Jewellery
- Gorgeous Dress-up for Princess Prom

Ice Princess and Prince Charming’s First Love Story is girls game with make-up and dress-up game play.

FEATURES:
- Realistic Island Theme
- Different Levels
- Real Make-up & spa tools
- Act like a Weeding planner
- Make Emily Princess and Prince Charming Happy
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- Easy Game play
- No In App Purchases
- No Internet required
and much more...
